title: Random Disconnects and Matchmaking Errors.
body:
I was playing ranked late tonight around 2-3am, and during one match several players, on both team disconnected from the game at the same time, including myself. My team managed to win, but the losing team didn't get a loss prevented, which stupid, as it clearly wasn't any problem with personnel internet connection. I then queued for another game, but upon hitting lobby, the client went black and I got a loading message. Just to be safe, I've stopped playing for the night.

Has anyone else encountered these problems tonight?

replies.body:
yea been getting a lot of lag/connection issues in game lobbies and random packet loss in games.
using a stable computer on a stable highspeed fiber connection. 

not being able to see whos called or picked what for a minute when i join lobby is absolutely terrible.

I've got the exact same issue man, great laptop, great internet, but massive packet loss and disconnecting constantly. 
What's up? {{item:3070}}
If we get stuck with any demotions I'm going to be so pissed.
yeah i got this problem too, sucks
OMG im in my promo, and we were winning, ad,ap and me (sup) keep ds,we are now losing!!!!!!!!wtf riot plz!!!!@riotgame
Do you just go round all the forum posts complaining about how you lost your ranked game cause dc or something

Happening server wide. Maybe it's a DDoS attack?
\
It happens, I get that. Just feel bad for the other team, not getting lose prevented. I'd be pissed if I was in the same position. Rito probably won't do much about it :(
